title: Lee Equity Takes Majority Stake in Newly Merged WealthTrust
content:
Lee Equity Partners  has taken a majority stake in wealth management company WealthTrust LLC. 

WealthTrust is a newly formed company that will use the established WealthTrust name and is a result of the merger of eight WealthTrust investment management firms previously owned by  Falcon Investment Advisors  and eight high-net-worth firms held by a subsidiary majority owned by Lee Equity, according to a news release....
